players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
Diana: "I agree with Alice. Let's all try to be open and honest in our discussions to build trust within the town."
Diana: "I'd like to propose that we all share our alibis from last night. This will help build trust and transparency within the town."

You: "I have nothing to hide. I was in my house last night, working on some personal projects. I believe that sharing our alibis will help build trust and ensure that we can all feel safe in this town."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice

players.name: Charlie
